trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for exceptions that are thrown by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packaging and serialization [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 用作由引发的异常的基类[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]打包和序列化[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsException"></xref> class that provides a specific error condition.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsException"></xref>提供特定的错误条件的类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error condition.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsException"></xref> class that provides specific <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsException"></xref>提供特定的类<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>和<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: 需序列化或反序列化对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The context, which includes source and destination, of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 上下文，其中包括源和目标的序列化流。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsException"></xref> class that provides a specific error condition and includes the cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsException"></xref>提供特定的错误情况并包括导致异常的类。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the current exception is thrown in a `catch` block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`参数不是`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 中, 引发当前异常`catch`处理内部异常的块。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error condition.
The underlying error that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsException"></xref>.
